detailsOfAchievement: Working in education sector since 1993 we have contributed a positive change to society. Save the girl Child always moved with the main objective of the organization as to bring an improvement in Child sex ratio in Bhind district and was successful in bringing a drastic change i.e. in 0 to 6 year category from 2001s 832 to 2011s 843. Due to organizations efforts and government support all the sonography centers were monitored on a continue basis as well as we continued with the awareness programs among the leaders and religious gurus which directly connected them to people with an objective of change and which resulted in awareness among the general people which have set an example for other districts of Madhya Pradesh and Bhind became the only district of the state which have resulted in positive change in Child Sex ratio in last decade. As the addiction of liquor, gutka and cigarette is more diverged in the labor level, organization planned exhibition sessions in villages and town on timely basis which helped them to understand its consequences by medium of movies and pictures developing its better understanding. Following up the same process for nearly 20 years from the year 1995 with organizing rallies and awareness programs, SBBSPS has brought many people to live a life without addiction and some are on urge of it. Working on all these Civic, Children, and Health issues on a level of great results organization is also working on training the ASHA workers of Bhind districts since 2012 and have trained total 1367 ASHA workers in Training Module 6 & 7. ASHA works as health activists in villages and provides services and awareness to community which has resulted in decline of Infant Mortality Rate and Maternal Mortality rate. Organization has also contributed in Prime Ministers Clean India Mission and is aiming to make clean and green Bhind in coming years with this yearly plantation program is on in town as well as village areas with self plantation and awareness programs among people to plant more and more trees with the slogan A tree is better than an empty place.

detailsOfAchievement: This institution is working for more than 28 years providing free food, education and hostel facilities to the physically challenged students particularly from the villages. It also facilitates polio affected boys to get polio corrective surgery. Many of the students have been well placed either in Govt or private jobs or have started their own business. Considering to its outstanding performance Govt of India MSJE nominated its Secretary as a delegate to visit Japan to represent the country.

sourceOfFunds.departmentName: Social Justice and Disabled Welfare Department Govt of MP
sourceOfFunds.purpose: State Govt provided the maintenance grant for running a hostel for physically challenged students amounting to Rs 199000 and also a grant of Rs 328960 towards the Salary of 3 employees viz Cook, Watchman and Accountant. In addition to this a sum of Rs 430690 was received from the public as a donation for the cause of good of differently abled children residing in the hostel and are being provided with free food, accommodation and other facilities. They go to schools and colleges for studies.
